mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clothes (cID, name, category, subcategory, photo, isFavorite, id) VALUES(#{cId},#{name},#{category}, #{subcategory}, #{photo}, #{isFavorite}, #{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE Clothes SET cId=#{cId}, name=#{name}, category=#{category}, subcategory=#{subcategory}, photo=#{photo}, isFavorite=#{isFavorite} where cId=#{cId};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM clothes where name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND id=#{id};
SELECT * FROM clothes where category=#{category} AND subCategory=#{subCategory} AND id=#{id};

SELECT * FROM clothes a, filter b where a.cId = b.sId AND a.category=#{category} AND a.subcategory=#{subCategory} AND b.spring=#{spring} AND b.summer=#{summer} AND b.fall=#{fall} AND b.winter=#{winter};
SELECT * FROM clothes where isFavorite=true AND id=#{id};
